description: Vite configuration file for a Vue.js frontend project, setting up plugins, resolve aliases, server options, and build configurations.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines and exports the Vite configuration object with custom settings for plugins, resolve aliases, and server options.

methods.name: vue
methods.description: Initializes the Vue.js plugin for Vite.

methods.name: vueJsx
methods.description: Initializes the Vue JSX plugin for Vite.

methods.name: vueDevTools
methods.description: Integrates Vue DevTools into the Vite development server.
